generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings, including a "30" speed limit marking and pedestrian crossing lines, indicating it is a road for vehicular traffic.
- sidewalk: The image shows sidewalks on both sides of the road, delineated by curbs and poles, designed for pedestrian use.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible in the image, including a large multi-story building in the background and a historic stone building on the right side of the street.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalks and in the background, providing greenery to the urban environment.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing clear and bright.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible in the image, including individuals walking on the sidewalk and crossing the street.
- car: Several cars are visible in the image, including vehicles driving on the road and parked along the side.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, with one showing a yellow light.
- traffic sign: A blue street sign reading "Elisabethenstrasse" is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible in the image, including traffic light poles and signs.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are visible parked on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
